name: Twipe Mobile Solutions
overview:
Twipe offers the next generation of turnkey digital newspaper publishing solutions on tablets and smartphones. The Twipe solution combines award-winning front-end apps with efficient workflow systems.

Twipe has developed the Next Generation Digital Newspaper. This state-of-the-art HTML5 technology transforms the print newspaper into an awesome tablet reading experience. The touch and swipe navigation is tactile and smooth. The publication reads and feels as a typical print newspaper with column layout and adapted fonts. There is clear hierarchy between articles. The publication has a beginning and an end. This turnkey SaaS solution is template based, allowing for a very efficient production and publication process. This solution is available on all platforms (iOS, Android, Windows8).

Our current customers and references include: De Standaard, NRC Handelsblad, L’avenir, Het Nieuwsblad, Gazet van Antwerpen, Belang van Limburg.

Our unique advantages:

> Cross-platform digital publishing for newspapers With Twipe, newspapers have 1 solution to publish on all iOS, Android and Windows 8 smartphones and tablets.

> Next Generation HTML5 Tablet publishing Twipe has developed an advanced HTML5 Tablet viewer which goes beyond the replica experience. It translates a newspaper semi-automatically in an awesome tablet user experience, using the best HTML5 technology available today.

> Efficient workflow The Twipe digital publishing solution runs fully automatically. We connect with any newsroom CMS (EIDOS, CCI, Atex,…) and convert the print content to mobile or tablet user experience.

> Reliable and scalable cloud technology The Twipe platform handles at the moment close to 1 million newspaper and magazine downloads per month for several high quality media customers.

> Deep knowledge of the tablet eco-systems We have a thorough understanding of the iTunes, the AppStore, the iPad, Newsstand, Android and Windows8 eco-systems.

> Experienced team We are active since 2008 in the newspaper mobile industry. Our team has over 20 years combined internet and mobile app development experience.
